channel.title: Lincoln County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lincoln County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: NV-318 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-318 north. Distance to Lund, Jct. US-6, and Ely.

item.title: NV-318 North - Lincoln County
item.description: NV-318 North in Lincoln County

item.title: NV-318 North - Hiko
item.description: Entering Hiko on NV-318 north. Elevation 3800.

item.title: NV-318 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-318 north. Distance to Hiko, Lund, and Ely.

item.title: NV-318 North - Lincoln County
item.description: NV-318 north in Lincoln County.

item.title: NV-318 North at NV-375
item.description: NV-318 North at NV-375. Merge right for NV-318 north to Hiko and Ely; merge left for NV-375 north to Rachel and Tonopah. This is the start of the Extraterrestrial Highway on NV-375 north.

item.title: NV-318 North at NV-375
item.description: NV-318 North at NV-375 in Lincoln County. Merge left for NV-375 North; merge right for NV-318 North.

item.title: NV-318 North Approaching NV-375
item.description: NV-318 North approaching NV-375 in Lincoln County.

item.title: NV-318 North - Lincoln County
item.description: NV-318 north in Lincoln County

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-318/To NV-375
item.description: US-93 North approaching NV-318/To NV-375 in Lincoln County. The route numbers are written out in text as SR-318 and SR-375

item.title: US-93 North NV-318 Jct.
item.description: US-93 north at NV-318 junction to Rachel and Tonopah (via NV-375). Continue north on US-93 for Caliente and Ely.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-318
item.description: US-93 North approaching NV-318 in Lincoln County

item.title: US-93 North - Ash Springs
item.description: Entering Ash Springs - Elevation 3630 on US-93 north.

item.title: US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-93 north. Distance to Caliente, Pioche, and Ely.

item.title: US-93 North - Alamo
item.description: Entering Alamo on US-93 north. Elevation 3450 Feet.

item.title: US-93 North - Pahranagat Valley
item.description: Entering the Pahranagat Valley on US-93 north.

item.title: US-93 North - Lincoln County
item.description: Lincoln County Line on US-93 north.

item.title: NV-322 East at US-93
item.description: NV-322 East at US-93 in Pioche. Both of the shields have fading lettering and almost look like they were hand painted on.

item.title: NV-322 East at US-93
item.description: NV-322 East at US-93. Turn right for US-93 south to Caliente; left for US-93 north to Ely.

item.title: Bus US-93/NV-321 South at NV-322
item.description: Bus US-93/NV-321 South at NV-322 in Pioche. Both NV-321 and NV-322 will end up at US-93. Turn left to continue north on Bus. US-93/NV-321. Continue straight for NV-322. This is a confusing intersection because there is no signs indicating either the Nevada state highways involved, nor which street the business loop continues on as.

item.title: Bus. US-93/NV-321 - Pioche
item.description: Entering Pioche on Bus. US-93/NV-321 north. Pioche is the county seat of Lincoln County.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching Business US-93
item.description: US-93 North Approaching Business US-93 (NV-321) to Pioche.

item.title: US-93 North - Cave Valley Jct.
item.description: US-93 north at Cave Valley Junction (Patterson Pass Road). Turn left for Cave Valley and the Silver State OHV Trailhead.

item.title: US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-93 north to Ely, Lehman Caves (Great Basin National Park), and Wells. Taken just north of Pony Springs.

item.title: US-93 North - Pony Springs
item.description: Entering the community of Pony Springs on US-93 North. Pony Springs consists of a few buildings and a state rest area.

item.title: US-93 North at Atlanta Jct.
item.description: US-93 North at Atlanta Jct.

item.title: US-93 North - Mt. Wilson Road
item.description: US-93 north at Mt. Wilson Road.

item.title: US-93 North at Bristol Wells/Sunnyside Jct.
item.description: US-93 North at Bristol Wells/Sunnyside Jct. Turn left for Bristol Wells (7 Miles) and Sunnyside (46 Miles).

item.title: US-93 North at NV-320
item.description: US-93 north at NV-320 south to Caselton and Prince Mine.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-320
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-320 south.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-322
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-322. Turn left on NV-322 for Echo Canyon State Park and Spring Valley State Park.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-322
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-322. Use NV-322 west for Pioche (Business); NV-322 east for Ursine; continue north on US-93 for Ely.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-322
item.description: US-93 North approaching NV-322.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-322
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-322.

item.title: US-93 North at NV-321
item.description: US-93 north at NV-321 (Business US-93) to Pioche. Turn left for business route into Pioche. Continue ahead for truck route into Pioche. NV-321 is a Nevada Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-93 North At NV-321 (Business US-93)
item.description: US-93 North At NV-321 (Business US-93).

item.title: US-93 North Approaching Business US-93
item.description: US-93 North Approaching Business US-93 (NV-321) to Pioche.

item.title: US-93 North at NV-320
item.description: US-93 north at NV-320 north.

item.title: US-93 North approaching NV-320 North
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-320 north to Caselton.

item.title: End NV-319 West at US-93
item.description: End NV-319 west at US-93.

item.title: End NV-319 West at US-93
item.description: End NV-319 west at US-93. Use US-93 north for Pioche and Ely. Use US-93 south for Caliente.

item.title: End NV-319 West at US-93
item.description: End NV-319 west at US-93. Use US-93 north for Cathedral Gorge State Park.

item.title: End NV-319 West at US-93
item.description: End NV-319 West at US-93

item.title: Welcome To Nevada
item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State on NV-319 west. Taken at the Utah-Nevada State Line.

item.title: US-93 North NV-319/Panaca Jct.
